ygData.subject: Re: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: Shamans dont charm in Sol B, The Kobold Noble will though. I ve had him 3 of 6 in a party, thank god for pumice. ... From: Naeeldar  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Shamans dont charm in Sol B, The Kobold Noble will though. I've had him 3 of 6 in a party, thank god for pumice.


----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 6:58 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clerics


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Never been charmed but as a matter of fact I have gone there with a bunch of
> people level 34-37. Had no problem with dealing the kobolds just have to be
> careful how you pull.
>
> Naeeldar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, September 17, 1999 7:49 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clerics
>
>
> >From: jhenders@...
> >
> >On Fri, Sep 17/99, Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> >> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >>
> >> Heh well not sure if you know but Greater Kobolds are only level 36 in
> Sol B
> >> and drop medium bronze.
> >
> >Ever try going there with a party of L36's when it's not already full of
> >higher level players? It's not pretty. It's a lot easier since they
> >stopped the shamans from charming though.
> >
